metadata.title: Azure Developer Associate AZ-204 Practice Questions

5.name: Connect to and Consume Azure Services

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Develop Azure Compute Solutions (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Azure Container Registry is a key concept in Develop Azure Compute Solutions. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure Developer Associate exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with implement azure functions. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any develop azure compute solutions task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Develop Azure Compute Solutions is most closely related to implement containerized solutions?
options: Develop Azure Compute Solutions governance and oversight
Develop Azure Compute Solutions implementation and operations
Develop Azure Compute Solutions assessment and testing
Develop Azure Compute Solutions risk management
questions.explanation: Implement containerized solutions falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Develop Azure Compute Solutions.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Develop Azure Compute Solutions (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Azure Container Apps is a key concept in Develop Azure Compute Solutions. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure Developer Associate exam.
